author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Following a suggestion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25090#issuecomment-652426145 this PR adds workflow 158.181 as 158.0 with concurrent lumis enabled.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 158.181 runs.
title: Add workflow 158.181 as 158.0 with concurrent lumis enabled
